sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects creation of cron file or files in Cron directories which could indicates potential persistence.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research), MSTIC

attributes.magic: ELF 32-bit LSB executable, Intel 80386, version 1 (GNU/Linux), statically linked, for GNU/Linux 2.6.18, BuildID[sha1]=307edfa923d9ff7e3793ec8771ab90f5343cb21e, stripped

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Detects malware from disclosed CN malware set
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
